actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A resolution relating to the redistribution of certain windfall corporate profits.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Federal Energy Administration to take all necessary steps to recover windfall profits resulting from use of illegal nonproduct cost passthroughs by petroleum producers and marketers. Authorizes the Administrator to use selective price rollbacks, civil penalties, and other measures authorized by law which will most equitably redistribute such monies throughout the economic sector.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the redistribution of certain windfall corporate profits.
